channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping two areas, 8th January
item.description:
Hi Looks like builders fly tipping in two spots in garden walk Road also hasn’t been swept in couple of weeks has normal

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Great Eastern Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging bushes, 8th January
item.description:
Hi, your council contractors were here yesterday and trimmed back the hedge in this location. Unfortunately each year it hangs a bit more over and due to the parking space being in constant use it has created a problem for the bin-men entering the road, some can and some dont want to scratch the car or the dustbin van so end up marching the bins from the end of the road and blocking it at the school run time. I am not sure if this is really an issue for your folks but I know it causes the dustbin men quite a bit of grief every week and seems like an easy fix with a good cut back this year as if It was done probably it would create more than an extra foot of space

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Windscreen/glass dumped by Auburn House, SE18 7tn, 8th January
item.description:
Dear Waste Team, I would be grateful if the windscreens dumped by the shrubs by Auburn House on Waverley Road, SE18 7TN is removed. Thank you in advance. Kind regards, Nina

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Waverley Road, Plumstead

item.title: Contractor’s fencing left for 8 months, 8th January
item.description:
Early in 2025 contractors mended a small pothole on the corner of Bradstock Road & Wick Road. A large fenced cage was left around the work but was never collected. It obstructs access & designated parking & collects litter. Contractor’s email bounces.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bradstock Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain causing flooding, 8th January
item.description:
From all the work that was done in the street the drain has become blocked and causing a flood at the gate and dangerous to the public and its been like this for a few months now, with the temperatures freezing its icing up the water and dangerous for pedestrians and vehicles passing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Manor Road, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous flooding and ice, 8th January
item.description:

item.title: Discarded Xmas trees blocking pavement, 8th January
item.description:
People have been dumping their Xmas trees on pavement. Near corner with Victoria Park Road. Pavement blocked and a danger to blind or disabled people. There are at least 20 trees there now

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Helena Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
